from itertools import permutations

def calculate_special_scores(arr):
    perms = set(permutations(arr))
    values = [sum(((x + 1) * y for (x, y) in enumerate(perm))) for perm in perms]
    return [{'': len(perms)}, {'total ssc': sum(values)}, {'max ssc': max(values)}, {'min ssc': min(values)}]
